sentences.sContent: She moved nearer, her long silk skirt rustling around her.
sentences.sCn: 她走近了，真丝长裙窸窣作响。

sentences.sContent: He rustled the papers on his desk.
sentences.sCn: 他把桌上的报纸翻得沙沙响。

words.tran: 发出沙沙声；使窸窣作响（rustle的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: if leaves, papers, clothes etc rustle, or if you rustle them, they make a noise as they rub against each other
